body: That was very quick! Thanks, Marc.

issue.title: JUnit Platform Console Standalone identifies as Kotlin module

repository.name: junit-framework
repository.description: ✅ The programmer-friendly testing framework for Java and the JVM

issue.body:
The `junit-platform-console-standalone` artifact entered the club of `kotlin.stdlib.jdk8` impostors. This is perhaps related to #2551 -- but could also stem from a separate issue when building the uber JAR file.

## kotlin.stdlib.jdk8

<https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/org/jetbrains/kotlin/kotlin-stdlib-jdk8/1.4.30/kotlin-stdlib-jdk8-1.4.30.jar>

1. `com.orange.ccmd:hurlfmt` -> [`1.0.39`, `1.0.40`, `1.0.41`, `1.0.42`]
1. `de.jensklingenberg.cabret:cabret-compiler-plugin-native` -> [`1.0.2`]

1. `dev.zacsweers.ticktock:ticktock-compiler` -> [`0.2.0`, `0.2.1`, `1.0.0-2020d`, `1.1.0-2020f`]
1. `io.github.baharmc:bedrock-edition` -> [`1.0`, `1.1`, `1.2`]

issue.title: JUnit Jupiter Engine has a dependency to kotlin-stdbli-jdk8

repository.name: junit-framework
repository.description: ✅ The programmer-friendly testing framework for Java and the JVM

issue.body:
Currently the 5.8.0-M1 version of `junit-jupiter-engine` has an explicit dependency to `kotlin-stdblib-jdk8`.

```xml
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.jetbrains.kotlin</groupId>
      <artifactId>kotlin-stdlib-jdk8</artifactId>
      <version>1.4.20</version>
      <scope>compile</scope>
    </dependency>
```
Is this really necessary?

## Context

 - 5.8.0-M1
 - Build Tool/IDE:
 -  Maven / IDEA IntelliJ

issue.title: [TE-29117] data generator for encoding and decoding string from/to base64

repository.name: testsigma-addons
repository.description: Add-ons are custom extensions built and shared by the Testsigma Community in the Marketplace. You can also build your own add-on for custom automated actions, data generators, integrations and much more to extend Testsigma’s automation capabilities.

issue.body:
# Jira
https://testsigma.atlassian.net/browse/TE-29117

Addon name : Base64 converter
Addon account: manojkumar.darshankar@testsigma.com
Jarvis link : https://jarvis.testsigma.com/ui/tenants/2817/addons

# fix 
added data generator to convert string to base64 and vise versa.

* **New Features**

  * Added functionality to decode a Base64-encoded string back to its original form.

* **Chores**

  * Added initial project properties for integration.
